products.name: Basics To Advanced In React
products.overview: Master React from the ground up, transitioning from beginner to advanced concepts with real-world projects and best practices.
products.long_description: This course takes you on a complete journey through React, starting with core fundamentals like components, state, and props, then progressing into advanced topics including hooks, context API, performance optimization, and routing. You'll build multiple projects, including single-page applications (SPAs), and learn how to structure scalable frontends using best practices. Whether you're just starting or looking to sharpen your skills, this course covers everything needed to become a proficient React developer.

products.name: Django Framework for Beginners
products.overview: A beginner-friendly introduction to building web applications with Django, Python’s powerful web framework.
products.long_description: Django Framework for Beginners is your gateway to developing robust, scalable web applications using Django. You'll learn about Django's architecture, models, views, templates, forms, and the admin interface. This hands-on course walks you through creating functional apps from scratch, integrating databases, and deploying your projects. Ideal for Python developers looking to expand into web development.

products.name: The Future of Design Systems
products.overview: Explore the evolution of design systems and how they’re shaping the future of product design and development.
products.long_description: This thought-provoking course or talk unpacks the next generation of design systems, focusing on scalability, automation, accessibility, and cross-platform consistency. Learn how modern design systems are transforming collaboration between designers and developers, and discover emerging tools and trends that are redefining how interfaces are built. Great for product teams, designers, and frontend developers looking to stay ahead of the curve.

products.name: The Complete Guide to Backend Development
products.overview: Learn how to build scalable, secure backend systems using modern tools and frameworks.
products.long_description: This comprehensive course covers the fundamentals and advanced topics in backend development. You'll work with databases (SQL and NoSQL), APIs, authentication, server architecture, caching, containerization, and deployment strategies. Technologies covered include Node.js, Express, Django, and more. Perfect for aspiring full-stack developers or backend engineers seeking to deepen their knowledge.

products.name: Build a Blockchain from Scratch in Go
products.overview: Understand blockchain technology by building your own from the ground up using Go (Golang).
products.long_description: Dive into the internals of blockchain by implementing one yourself in Go. This course covers cryptographic hashing, consensus algorithms, blocks, peer-to-peer networking, and basic smart contract concepts. By building the entire blockchain, you will gain a deep understanding of how decentralized systems work. Ideal for developers interested in cryptocurrency, distributed systems, and low-level programming.

products.name: Frontend Fastlane Plan With Projects
products.overview: Accelerate your frontend skills with a project-based roadmap covering key technologies and workflows.
products.long_description: Frontend Fastlane is a structured learning path designed to take you from HTML/CSS basics to advanced JavaScript, React, and frontend tooling through hands-on projects. Each project introduces new challenges and technologies, including responsive design, accessibility, state management, and performance optimization. Ideal for those who want a fast, effective route to becoming job-ready.

products.name: Master the Code Review
products.overview: Learn how to give and receive code reviews that lead to better code and stronger teams.
products.long_description: Code reviews are more than just syntax checks—they're about collaboration, knowledge sharing, and maintaining quality. This course teaches you how to conduct constructive reviews, identify common code smells, enforce consistency, and navigate team dynamics. Suitable for engineers of all levels, especially team leads and those contributing to open-source projects.
